seo.title: A Premier Behavioral Health Center in Prescott, Arizona
seo.description: Since 1988, Prescott House has been a trusted destination for lasting recovery with programs for substance use disorder, gambling addiction, and love and intimacy disorders.

hero.heading: A Premier Behavioral Health Center in Prescott, Arizona
hero.subheading: Trusted care for lasting recovery and meaningful change.

sections.content: Since 1988, Prescott House has been a trusted destination for individuals seeking lasting recovery and meaningful change. Located in the heart of Prescott, Arizona, we are a leading mental and behavioral health organization offering three distinct specialty programs.

items.title: Substance Use Disorder Treatment
items.description: Structure, accountability, and trauma informed healing.

items.title: Gambling Addiction Recovery
items.description: Break free from compulsive betting and regain control.

items.title: Love and Intimacy Disorder Treatment
items.description: Heal patterns that block trust, self worth, and connection.

sections.content: What sets Prescott House apart is our commitment to long term healing. We are not a quick fix facility. We are a therapeutic community where individuals slow life down, face challenges in a safe and structured environment, and gradually rebuild their sense of self with increased responsibility and support. For over three decades, we have helped clients break free from harmful patterns and step into lives of clarity, accountability, and purpose.

items.name: Dan C
items.quote: This is undoubtedly the best addiction treatment center in the nation. Prescott House does it right, they are professional and caring... My son recently celebrated 13 months drug and alcohol free.

items.name: Christian A
items.quote: If you're looking for a fresh start and a life building experience, this is the place... The experienced and professional staff helped me look into things I never thought of and turned me on to a much more healthy lifestyle.

items.name: Ian H
items.quote: It was the hardest thing I have ever done, but this program provided me the structure and therapy I needed to live a better life where I was no longer a slave to substance use.

items.name: Laura H
items.quote: The entire staff are alumni, so they have the expertise and life experience that really makes the difference. The work they do is nothing short of a miracle.

items.name: Kyle W
items.quote: This place saved my life. It helped me further my recovery and reintegrate into society so getting a job was not as stressful.

items.name: Roderick B
items.quote: Recovery is not a course or a quick fix, it is a commitment. Seven months later, I completed the program and needed every day of it.

items.name: Dan S
items.quote: Without Prescott House, I would be in jail, an institution, and surely dead. They taught me how to live life on life's terms.

items.name: Benjamin T
items.quote: The community was supportive and the quality of therapy was unparalleled. I learned to shed shame and to love myself and others.

sections.heading: Insurance
sections.content: Reach out to our support staff to verify your insurance and learn more about our treatment programs.

seo.title: About Prescott House
seo.description: Our structured path, culture of accountability, clinical excellence, dual diagnosis care, and purposeful aftercare.

hero.heading: Our Approach
hero.subheading: Structure, time, and the courage to grow through discomfort.

sections.content: At Prescott House, we believe that sustainable recovery does not come from shortcuts. It comes from structure, time, and the courage to grow through discomfort. Unlike models that offer temporary stabilization, our programs increase responsibility gradually and intentionally. We expect mistakes and welcome them, because growth comes from learning with accountability and support.

items.title: A Structured Path to Independence
items.description: We slow life down so clients can reconnect with themselves. Through each phase of care we add responsibility like employment, relationships, and community involvement.

items.title: A Culture of Accountability
items.description: Growth through honest feedback, peer support, and therapeutic confrontation. High standards matched with compassion.

items.title: Unmatched Clinical Excellence
items.description: Therapists are hand selected for specialized expertise and deep commitment.

items.title: Dual Diagnosis, Holistic Treatment
items.description: We address underlying causes, integrating mental health care, trauma work, and behavior focused therapies.

items.title: Aftercare with Purpose
items.description: Clients leave with a personalized aftercare plan that supports life after treatment.

sections.content: Prescott House is more than a treatment center. It is a place to rebuild, reimagine, and reclaim your life one step at a time.

seo.title: Programs
seo.description: Long term, clinically sophisticated care for substance use disorder, gambling addiction, and love and intimacy disorders.

hero.heading: Specialty Programs
hero.subheading: Built on more than 35 years of behavioral health excellence.

items.title: Love and Intimacy
items.summary: Long term, clinically sophisticated program for compulsive patterns in relationships, sex, and emotional dependency.
details: Support for pornography compulsivity, infidelity, love addiction, and intimacy avoidance.
Trauma focused healing with trusted and cutting edge modalities that help regulate the nervous system.
30 task model developed by Dr. Patrick Carnes guides a structured path toward healthy intimacy and integrity.

items.title: Gambling Addiction
items.summary: Specialized long term program to break free from the gambling cycle including sports betting, slots, stock trading, and online games.
details: Support from a team that understands the thrill and the despair of the cycle.
Evidence based tools, peer community, and a clear path forward.

items.title: Substance Use Disorder
items.summary: Drug and alcohol treatment rooted in clinical excellence with structure, accountability, and trauma informed healing.
details: Care for alcohol, opioids, stimulants, and polysubstance use.
We meet clients where they are and help build a life worth staying sober for.
items.whyLongTerm: Long term treatment provides time to develop coping strategies, build resilience, and create meaningful change beyond symptom management.

journey.detail: If needed, we coordinate safe, medically supervised detox with trusted providers before entry into residential care.
On site living with daily clinical programming, individual and group therapy, trauma work, peer support, and holistic wellness.
Step down gradually while practicing real world responsibility with continued support.
Tailored plan for life post treatment including housing, employment assistance, therapy referrals, and alumni engagement.

clinicalFeatures: Trauma Informed Therapy (CBT, DBT, brain spotting)

sections.heading: You do not have to stay stuck
